```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

codes <- read_excel("./Data/ProblemCData.xlsx", sheet = 2)
energy <- read_excel("./Data/ProblemCData.xlsx", sheet = 1)

# Convert to table with each MSN value as column name
energySpread <- energy %>%
  spread(MSN, Data)

energyList <- split(energySpread[,-1], f = energySpread$StateCode)
```

```{r}
library(TSA)

periodogram(energyList$CA$RETCB)
?periodogram
```

```{r}
codesCleaned <- codesOrdered[-duplicated(codesOrdered$Description),] #Might want to check if duplicated units have 0 in one and value in other
str_detect(codesCleaned$Description, "Factor")

unique(codesCleaned$Unit)


codesCleaned$Description[str_detect(codesCleaned$Description, "total consum")]
```
